text: Tomadera jan'ya niscaya'i uttama adarsa rayeche ibrahimera o tamra sange yara chila tadera madhye -- yakhana tara tadera lokadalake balechila -- ''niscaya amara dayasun'ya tomadera theke, ara allah‌ke bada diye tomara yara upasana kara tara theke, amara tomadera pratyakhyana karechi, kaje'i amadera madhye o tomadera madhye satruta o hinsa-bidbesa ciradinera jan'ya suru hayeche yataksana na tomara allah‌te -- tamra ekatbe-- bisbasa na kara.’’ Tabe tamra pitrpurusera prati ibrahimera baktabya chila -- ''ami niscaya tomara jan'ya ksamaprarthana karaba, ara allah‌ra kacha theke tomara jan'ya an'ya kono kichute amara ksamata ne'i.’’''Amadera prabhu! Tomara upare'i amara nirbhara karachi, ara tomara'i kache amara phirachi, ara tomara kache'i to pratyabartana.
